# fui-typography

The `fui-typography` component is used to display text with different styles.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                         | Type                                                          | Default  |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `code`      | `code`      | If `true`, the text will be displayed as code.      | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `deleted`   | `deleted`   | If `true`, the text will be displayed as deleted.   | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | If `true`, the text will be displayed as disabled.  | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `italic`    | `italic`    | If `true`, the text will be displayed in italic.    | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `keyboard`  | `keyboard`  | If `true`, the text will be displayed as keyboard.  | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `mark`      | `mark`      | If `true`, the text will be displayed as marked.    | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `strong`    | `strong`    | If `true`, the text will be displayed as bold.      | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `type`      | `type`      | The type of the text to display.                    | `"danger" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "text" \| "warning"` | `'text'` |
| `underline` | `underline` | If `true`, the text will be displayed as underlined.| `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |

----------------------------------------------
